wikipedia_page.main:
John Edward Chambers (born 23 October 1971) is an English cricketer.  Chambers is a right-handed batsman who bowls right-arm medium-fast.  He was born in Barking, London.and is now a primary school teacher
Chambers represented the Essex Cricket Board in a single List A match against the Sussex Cricket Board in the 1st round of the 2002 Cheltenham & Gloucester Trophy which was held in 2001.He currently plays club cricket for Wanstead Cricket Club in the Essex Premier League.
